title: 02/01/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 02/01/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
-The Rams trading for Stafford is all about trusting Sean McVay

-People will argue if Mahomes beats Brady then he is the GOAT

-Matt Stafford wanted no part of being traded to the Patriots

-Where Colin was right, where Colin was wrong


Guests: Scott Pioli, 5x NFL Executive of the Year

Peter Schrager, FOX Sports NFL Insider
